posts.post_content:
$95 + $4 for USPS with tracking...insurance is a few dollars more. 

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/t212willis.jpg[/IMG]
For giving me such a great review, I am happy to take Willis if still available.

He is available and yours Jeff. But please don't think you need to do anything. Your pizza and hospitality were awesome and I am glad to say so...  My PP is leon@net54baseball.....
PM me your addy please...thanks man
